titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Virgil B. Rochte collection

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Virgil B. Rochte was a chiropractor in Detroit, Mich., later living in Manistee, Mich. He was also a singer, performing for churches and societies.
archdesc.scopecontent: Programs and other items relating to Rochte's singing; most are bulletins from Detroit's St. Mark's Methodist Episcopal Church. One 1929 bulletin includes a financial history of the church.

corpname.primary_name: St. Mark's Methodist Episcopal Church (Detroit, Mich.)
